title: The Best AI Image Models of 2026 (Same Prompts) | Dzine
relevance: Official Dzine channel comparison of 6 AI image models using identical prompts across 6 categories. Confirms Nano Banana Pro as best for text-heavy infographics, validates model routing decisions in dzine_schema.py, and documents Expression Edit sliders, Enhance & Upscale capabilities, and current pricing tiers.
summary: Dzine's official channel tests MidJourney V7, GPT Image 1.5, Flux 2 Pro, Nano Banana Pro, Dzine Realistic V3, and Seedream 4.5 with identical prompts across 6 categories: portraits, infographics, landscapes, character sheets, image-to-image (character sheet to movie poster), and image editing (color/brightness changes). Nano Banana Pro dominates infographics with perfect text rendering. MidJourney V7 wins portraits (emotion/depth) and image editing (precise object changes). Dzine Realistic V3 excels at landscapes. Seedream 4.5 handles character sheets best. Flux 2 Pro wins Img2Img with legible poster text. Also demonstrates Expression Edit (10+ sliders for eyes/mouth/head), Enhance & Upscale (up to 4x, max 6144x3392), AI Expand, AI Eraser, Hand Repair, Background Remove, layers panel, Chat Editor, and Text tool. Pricing ranges from Free (32 credits/day) to Master ($59.99/mo unlimited images).

key_insights.insight: Nano Banana Pro is the clear winner for text accuracy in infographics
key_insights.details: When tested with an identical LinkedIn profile infographic prompt, Nano Banana Pro rendered ALL text correctly — even tiny text was readable and LinkedIn profile details were accurate. GPT Image 1.5 came second (readable text). MidJourney V7 and Dzine Realistic V3 produced unreadable text. This confirms Nano Banana Pro as the right default for any image requiring text overlays or spec callouts.

key_insights.insight: MidJourney V7 produces the most emotionally compelling portraits
key_insights.details: For cinematic close-up portraits, MidJourney V7 delivered the best emotion, depth, and realism. Dzine Realistic V3 showed excellent skin pore detail. GPT Image 1.5 had incredible iris and tear detail. Flux 2 Pro was very expressive. For Ray avatar hero shots requiring emotional impact, MidJourney V7 is optimal.

key_insights.insight: Seedream 4.5 is best for character consistency sheets
key_insights.details: For character sheet generation (front/side/back views), Seedream 4.5 produced proper multi-angle views with correct face sizing. GPT Image 1.5 was comprehensive but cramped. MidJourney gave useful front+side+fullbody. No model was perfect, but Seedream 4.5 was the most reliable for the task. Relevant for generating consistent Ray avatar reference sheets.

key_insights.insight: Dzine Realistic V3 excels at landscapes and environmental scenes
key_insights.details: All models performed well on landscapes, but Dzine Realistic V3 stood out for natural beauty. MidJourney had a filmic quality. Results were very close across all models. For product environment backgrounds (kitchen, living room, desk, garage), Dzine Realistic V3 is the best choice.

key_insights.insight: Flux 2 Pro is best for Img2Img with text requirements
key_insights.details: When converting a character sheet to a movie poster via Img2Img, Flux 2 Pro was the only model that actually wrote legible text ('THE UNBROKEN PRINCE IN CINEMAS'). MidJourney and Nano Banana Pro produced incredible cinematic quality but no readable text. For Img2Img tasks where text must be preserved or added, use Flux 2 Pro.

key_insights.insight: MidJourney V7 is best for precise image editing
key_insights.details: For image editing tasks (change horse color from brown to white, brighten face), MidJourney V7 produced a perfect white horse with brightened face at stunning quality. Flux 2 Pro was also very good. Nano Banana Pro failed to change the horse color. For targeted edits to generated images, MidJourney V7 is the top choice.

key_insights.insight: Expression Edit has 10+ granular sliders for face manipulation
key_insights.details: Expression Edit Custom mode provides: Eyes (Openness, Horizontal Gaze, Vertical Gaze, Eyebrow, Wink) + Mouth (Lip Openness, Pouting, Pursing, Grin, Smile, Roundness) + Head (Pitch, Yaw, Roll). Template mode also available for preset expressions. Costs 4 credits. Output placed on canvas via 'Place on canvas' button.

key_insights.insight: Enhance & Upscale supports up to 4x with max 6144x3392 output
key_insights.details: Images can be upscaled up to 4x resolution with maximum output of 6144x3392. Export formats include PNG and JPEG. This is essential for producing high-resolution product images from Txt2Img or Img2Img outputs.

key_insights.insight: Output quality and aspect ratio options are extensive
key_insights.details: Output Quality slider offers 2K and 4K options. Aspect Ratio presets include 9:16, 1:1, 16:9, Auto, plus more via dropdown. Per-model controls include Face Match and Color Match sliders. Prompt Improver toggle available for AI-enhanced prompting.

key_insights.insight: Dzine pricing: Master plan at $59.99/mo gives unlimited images
key_insights.details: Free tier: 32 credits/day. Beginner: $8.99/mo. Creator: $24.99/mo. Master: $59.99/mo (unlimited images). Annual Master: $50/mo. Rayviews account is on Master plan with unlimited fast image credits, confirming no need to economize on generation count or quality settings.

key_insights.insight: AI Expand, Eraser, Hand Repair, Background Remove available in top toolbar
key_insights.details: Beyond core generation, Dzine provides: AI Expand (extends canvas content naturally), AI Eraser (remove unwanted elements), Hand Repair (fix AI hand artifacts), Background Remove, Edit Cutout, Transform, and Crop — all accessible from the top toolbar. Layers panel provides Photoshop-like layer management.

key_insights.insight: Model routing matrix confirmed for Rayviews pipeline
key_insights.details: Based on head-to-head testing: Nano Banana Pro for text/infographics/specs, MidJourney V7 for portraits/emotion/editing, Dzine Realistic V3 for environments/landscapes, Seedream 4.5 for character sheets/consistency, Flux 2 Pro for Img2Img with text. This should update the model routing in dzine_schema.py.

tools_mentioned.name: Dzine Canvas Editor
tools_mentioned.note: Full AI image generation platform with 6+ models, Img2Img, Expression Edit, Enhance & Upscale, AI Expand, layers, and Chat Editor.

tools_mentioned.name: MidJourney V7
tools_mentioned.note: Best for portraits and image editing. Available within Dzine platform.

tools_mentioned.name: GPT Image 1.5
tools_mentioned.note: Strong text rendering, incredible iris/tear detail in portraits. Available within Dzine.

tools_mentioned.name: Flux 2 Pro
tools_mentioned.note: Best for Img2Img with text requirements. Very expressive portraits.

tools_mentioned.name: Nano Banana Pro
tools_mentioned.note: Dzine's default model. Clear winner for text accuracy and infographics.

tools_mentioned.name: Dzine Realistic V3
tools_mentioned.note: Best for landscapes and natural environments. Excellent skin pore detail in portraits.

tools_mentioned.name: Seedream 4.5
tools_mentioned.note: Best for character consistency sheets (front/side/back views).

Build model selection logic: detect prompt intent (text-heavy vs portrait vs environment) and route to optimal model automatically
Test Expression Edit sliders on Ray avatar for varied expressions across video segments
Integrate Enhance & Upscale (4x, max 6144x3392) into asset pipeline for hero product shots
Evaluate AI Expand for extending product scene backgrounds beyond original frame

Build expression preset library for consistent Ray expressions across segments

Apply Enhance & Upscale (4x) to hero product shots
Test AI Expand for extending product scene compositions

transcript_highlights.text: For infographics, Nano Banana Pro is the clear winner — all text is correct, even tiny text is readable
transcript_highlights.note: Confirms Nano Banana Pro as best-in-class for text rendering accuracy

transcript_highlights.text: MidJourney V7 gives the best emotion, depth, and realism for portraits
Seedream 4.5 gives proper front, back, and side views with good face sizing
Flux 2 Pro actually wrote THE UNBROKEN PRINCE IN CINEMAS legibly on the poster
MidJourney V7 — perfect white horse, brightened face, stunning quality
Expression Edit: Eyes openness, gaze, eyebrow, wink; Mouth: lip openness, pouting, pursing, grin
Enhance & Upscale up to 4x, maximum 6144x3392, export PNG or JPEG
